translations: n.解释，理解；表演，演奏，艺术处理；口译

sentences.sentence: History is always a matter of interpretation.
sentences.translation: 历史总是一个诠释的问题。

sentences.sentence: She stamped her own interpretation on the role.
sentences.translation: 她给那个角色注入了她自己的诠释。

sentences.sentence: Her interpretation of the facts may be open to doubt.
sentences.translation: 她对事实的解释可能有待质疑。
